articles.title: Barbados drops British colonial ties, replaces Queen Elizabeth as head of state - CNN
articles.description: Barbados has cut its last remaining bonds to the British monarchy after nearly 400 years. In a vibrant celebratory ceremony, the Caribbean island removed Queen Elizabeth II as head of state and inaugurated its first-ever President. CNN's Max Foster reports.
